item.title: ローカルニュースサイトの創業者と元マイクロソフトのエンジニアが、会議を聞いて使えるまとめ記事を書くAIを作った方法と、人間のニュアンスが失われる理由（Sophie Culpepper/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Sophie Culpepper / Nieman Lab:
How a local news site founder and an ex-Microsoft engineer created an AI to listen to meetings and write usable summary articles, and how human nuance gets lost  —  “Is it ready for primetime, ready to be released to the masses?  Absolutely not...But can it be done?

item.title: PostがiOSアプリを発表、440K+のユーザーが参加していると発表、様々なパブリッシャーのニュースに対してマイクロペイメントを行えるニュース重視のソーシャルネットワーク（Amanda Silberling/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Amanda Silberling / TechCrunch:
Post launches an iOS app and says 440K+ users have joined the news-focused social network that lets users make micropayments for news from various publishers  —  One of many buzzy apps competing to be “the next Twitter,” Post launched its iOS app on Thursday.

item.title: 情報源News CorpのHarperCollinsとプライベートエクイティ大手KKRがSimon & Schusterの入札者に、第2ラウンドの入札は7月中旬に予定されている（Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Sources: News Corp's HarperCollins and private-equity giant KKR are among the bidders for Simon & Schuster; second-round bids are due in mid-July  —  Simon & Schuster is pursuing a sale once again after the U.S. government blocked its attempted merger with Penguin Random House

item.title: トラッキングや広告を削除するYouTubeのオープンソース「代替フロントエンド」Invidious、API違反でYouTubeが停止勧告書を送ったと発表（Jules Roscoe/VICE）
item.description:
Jules Roscoe / VICE:
Invidious, an open-source “alternative front-end” for YouTube that removes tracking and ads, says YouTube sent a cease-and-desist letter over API violations  —  Invidious lets users browse YouTube without being tracked.  Its developers say they won't make changes until they have to.

item.title: 情報源はこちらカナダでまだオリジナルコンテンツの委託を行っていないDisney+が、2023年まで、場合によっては2024年まで同国での委託業務を一時停止（Manori Ravindran/Variety)
item.description:
Manori Ravindran / Variety:
Sources: Disney+, which hasn't made an original content commission in Canada yet, pauses commissioning work in the country through 2023 and possibly into 2024  —  Sources indicate that the Mouse House has put a pin in local programming from across its brands in Canada, and isn't actively commissioning.

item.title: 2015年からディズニーのCFOを務めるChristine McCarthy氏が退任、7月1日からパーク事業のファイナンスチーフであるKevin Lansberry氏が暫定CFOとして働く（CNBC）。
item.description:
CNBC:
Christine McCarthy, Disney's CFO since 2015, is stepping down; Kevin Lansberry, finance chief for parks business, will work as interim CFO starting July 1  —  - Christine McCarthy will step down as Disney's chief financial officer.  — She is taking family medical leave and will advise the company as it seeks a successor.

item.title: 世界で最も人気のある海賊版ストリーミングサイトの1つであるSoap2Dayが、何の説明もなく突然閉鎖される（Andy Maxwell/TorrentFreak)
item.description:
Andy Maxwell / TorrentFreak:
Soap2Day, one of the world's most popular pirate streaming sites, unexpectedly shuts down with no explanation  —  Soap2Day, one of the world's most popular pirate streaming sites, has unexpectedly shut down.  Via numerous domains, many put in place to avoid site-blocking measures …

item.title: CCDHは、中絶反対団体の広告が、ケアを提供しない「妊娠危機センター」にユーザーを誤誘導することで、Googleが2年間で$10Mを稼いだと推定している（Kari Paul/The Guardian)
item.description:
Kari Paul / The Guardian:
The CCDH estimates Google made $10M in two years from anti-abortion organizations' ads misdirecting users to “pregnancy crisis centers” that do not provide care  —  Study finds the search giant has profited since Roe was overturned from anti-abortion groups buying misleading search terms

item.title: TwitchがPartner Plus層を開始、3ヶ月連続で350以上の定期有料会員を獲得したクリエイターに70/30の収益分配を提供（Jay Peters/The Verge）
item.description:
Jay Peters / The Verge:
Twitch launches a Partner Plus tier, offering a 70/30 revenue sharing split to creators who have 350+ recurring paid subscriptions for three consecutive months  —  Twitch is introducing a new “Partner Plus” program that will give streamers an increased 70 percent of the share of their subscription revenues …

item.title: Insider EIC Nich Carlsonは、トラフィックと購読者が減少していることをスタッフに伝え、アウトレットはビジネス、経済、および技術に焦点を戻すことを計画している、など（Max Tani/@maxwelltani)
item.description:
Max Tani / @maxwelltani:
Insider EIC Nich Carlson tells staff that traffic and subscribers are down, the outlet plans to return its focus to business, the economy, and tech, and more  —  Insider EIC @nichcarlson addresses the newsroom post-strike, says “after a few years of drift,” the media company is returning to its core focus of business, economy, and tech coverage and becoming “the next-gen WSJ” [image]

item.title: 上院司法委員会は、報道機関がテック企業と共同で交渉することを支援する「ジャーナリズム競争・保存法」を進める（Ted Johnson/Deadline)
item.description:
Ted Johnson / Deadline:
The Senate Judiciary Committee advances the Journalism Competition and Preservation Act, which would help news outlets jointly negotiate with tech companies  —  The Senate Judiciary Committee revived the prospects for a long-proposed bill that would bolster print and broadcast news outlets in their negotiations with tech giants.

item.title: Meta、InstagramのBroadcast Channelsをグローバルに拡大、公開された1対多のメッセージや画像などのコンテンツをフォロワーと共有可能に（Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Ivan Mehta / TechCrunch:
Meta expands Instagram's Broadcast Channels globally, letting users share public, one-to-many messages, images, and other content with their followers  —  Meta announced today that it's rolling out Instagram's Channels features for broadcasting messages globally.

item.title: グアテマラの裁判官は、政治的動機による裁判とみなされ、ジャーナリストJosé Rubén Zamoraにマネーロンダリングの罪で懲役6年の判決を下した（Nina Lakhani/Associated Press）。
item.description:
Nina Lakhani / Associated Press:
Judges in Guatemala sentence journalist José Rubén Zamora to six years in prison for money laundering in what is regarded as a politically motivated trial  —  José Rubén Zamora, 66, convicted and sentenced on money-laundering charges press freedom groups say were trumped up

item.title: 英国のインディペンデント社は、最終的に米国に英国と同数の従業員を置く計画だ。同店には300人のスタッフがおり、うち65人が英国外にいる（Thomas Seal/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Thomas Seal / Bloomberg:
The UK's Independent plans to eventually have the same number of workers in the US as in Britain; the outlet has 300 staff, of which 65 are outside the UK  —  Independent Digital News & Media Ltd., the first major UK newspaper to go fully online, plans to boost its presence in the US next year …

item.title: Streamlabs、Podcast Editorを発表、テキストベースの編集、他プラットフォーム向けのコンテンツ再フォーマットなどを提供、月額19ドルのUltraパッケージに含まれる（Jess Weatherbed/The Verge）
item.description:
Jess Weatherbed / The Verge:
Streamlabs launches Podcast Editor, offering text-based editing, content reformatting for other platforms, and more, included in the $19 per month Ultra package  —  Announced today by Streamlabs' parent company Logitech, the new Podcast Editor includes AI-assisted tools like text-based editing …
